plot: Inspired by the themes explored in the films of Hong Kong film director Wong Kar-Wai, this is a checklist of what to expect from modern love. Sex...longing...rejection... and pain.
title: Things Wong Kar-Wai Taught Me About Love
plot_es: Inspired by the themes explored in the films of Hong Kong film director Wong Kar-Wai, this is a checklist of what to expect from modern love. Sex...longing...rejection... and pain.
original_name: Things Wong Kar-Wai Taught Me About Love
plot_en: Inspired by the themes explored in the films of Hong Kong film director Wong Kar-Wai, this is a checklist of what to expect from modern love. Sex...longing...rejection... and pain.
